triggers.label: an items state exceeds a threshold
triggers.description: Triggers Rules on Events if the value exceeds some Threshold

configDescriptions.name: threshold
configDescriptions.label: threshold
configDescriptions.description: this is value of the threshold; if BETWEEN is selected as operator, then two values, comma separated are expected here!

configDescriptions.name: itemName
configDescriptions.label: Item
configDescriptions.description: this is the name of the item which should be observed

configDescriptions.name: timeboxValue
configDescriptions.label: timebox
configDescriptions.description: don't execute the rule directly, only if the item's value exceeds the threshold for a given timespan

configDescriptions.name: timeboxUnit
configDescriptions.label: Timebox UNIT
configDescriptions.description: the Unit of the selected Timebox interval (defaults to Minutes)

configDescriptions.name: operator
configDescriptions.label: compare operator
configDescriptions.description: this operator is used for the comparsion of the threshold

outputs.name: itemState
outputs.label: itemState
outputs.description: The latest state of the item.

outputs.name: timeboxValue
outputs.label: timebox
outputs.description: this is set if the rule was triggered because of an exceeded timebox

outputs.name: timeboxUnit
outputs.label: timeboxUnit
outputs.description: this is set if the rule was triggered because of an exceeded timebox
